column1: Uchi////Uchi is not just about the sushi
column2: but the knowledgeable chefs and great service.  It is an experience that you will definitely pay for
column3: but worth it for the occasional treat (unless you are lucky enough to not have to worry about money).  I sat at the sushi bar so the chef was my "waiter".  I basically surrendered my menu and let him give me his top picks and I was not disappointed.  Everything was amazing and fresh.  I recommend.
